cards Package¶

card Module¶

class lib.cards.card.Card(suit, value)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a basic Card. Holds a suit and a value.

All cards should have a suit and value, with exception for jokers. Jokers have a value with no suit.

Parameters:
  • suit (Suit or None) – the card suit.
  • value (Value) – the card value.
class lib.cards.card.Suit(suit)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a basic card suit.

Suit values are stored as integers. Diamonds is represented by 0. Club is represented by 1. Heart is represented by 2. Spade is represented by 3.

Parameters:suit (int) – A suit value (0-3).
class lib.cards.card.Value(value)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a basic card value.

Two through ten are represented by their actual numerical values. A Jack is represented by 11. A Queen is represented by 12. A King is represented by 13. An Ace is represented by 14. A Small Joker is represented by 15. A Big Joker is represented by 16.

Parameters:value (int) – A card value.

factory Module¶

class lib.cards.factory.CardFactory[source]¶

Bases: object

Factory class for creating cards. The factory contains validations to ensure that cards generated by this class are valid cards and contain valid suits and values.

classmethod big_joker()[source]¶
Returns:a big joker Card.
classmethod card(suit, value)[source]¶

Create a card object with validations.

Parameters:
  • suit (int or None) – The card suit.
  • value (int) – The card value.
Returns:

a lib.cards.card.Card.

Returns:a small joker Card.
